Howdy folks , welcome to episode 37 of iDeveloper Live. This is our last show of 2011 and we are going to looking back and looking forward
Audio Feed will be at http://ideveloper.tv:6996/ideveloperlive and go live 15 minutes before the show
Todays show is a little earlier than usual at 5PM GMT / 12PM EST / 9AM PST
We will try and change convore next year
Three questions for you for todays show. 1. What's the developer highlight of your year. 2. What's the worse developer moment of the year.  3. Software Pick of The Year
aand it's back
Thanks for the heads-up Scotty... hopefully i can tune in today... we'll see.

I'll try again then...
3. Twitter, the service rather than an application. Essential for keeping me in touch with other developers, keeping up to date with news and for providing light-relief.

except keychain syncing!!  Why they left that out is beyond me... it totally fucks up ability to use mult devices...
